markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=110) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=103)

</column>

---

You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs. When you use [Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=103), add the following to the list you can choose from: clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, stupefied 1, or –10-foot status penalty to Speeds.

<title level="2">Greater Debilitating Bomb leads to...</title>
[True Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=118)
name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
